name: Terror in Abyss
description:
CONCEPT

Terror in Abyss is a Doom-like FPS, where you embody a scientist equipped with a molecular harpoon gun, trying to escape from an underwater military base currently under  attack by two dimensional aquatic monsters.

CONTROLS

Up / Down Arrow : Move forward / backward 

Right / Left Arrow : Turn the camera right/left 

Spacebar : Shoot, use the elevator

CONTEXT

Made using Unity 2019.3 at ESA Games Carpentras (France). 

Exercice : make a Doom-like old school FPS using only the 4 directional arrows of the keyboard and the spacebar for controls, and fight against 2D entities in a 3D environnement. We were given two months to complete the game.
